front.title: Packet Loss Signaling for Encrypted Protocols

abstract.t: This document defines an extension to the QUIC transport protocol to allow endpoints to signal packet loss in a way that can be used by network devices to measure and locate the source of the loss. Discussion of this work is encouraged to happen on the QUIC IETF mailing list quic@ietf.org [1] or on the GitHub repository which contains the draft: https://github.com/igorlord/draft- ferrieuxhamchaoui-lossbits [2].
